thread.section_title: PlushBeds.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlushBeds.com | plushbeds.com
thread.title: Lisha V.

author: Lisha V.
title: Lisha V.
text: We ordered the Natural Bliss mattress in the medium and we love it! Most comfortable and rested sleep we've had in a long time. We also got two of the shredded latex pillows. I had a feather pillow, which I didn't think anything could possibly be more comfortable, but boy was I wrong. Now that I've tried these pillows I'll never go back to feathers. The mattress was very easy to set up and it shipped fast. We would highly recommend this company and their products! Also, Judy was such a big help and we're very grateful to her.
